channel.title: Team Desire-X [Need People]
channel.description:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/oOSvP.png[/img] Hello Mopar,
[u][b][size=14pt]Whats Desire-X?[/size] [/b][/u] [font=times new roman]We are creating a team who are going to be working on a 317 server and will be buying vps/webhosting/domain etc, there is going to be really cool features on the server were looking for dedicated staff who are willing to stick by us. [/font] [size=18pt][u][b]People we need------ :)[/b][/u][/size]
Coders--[1/3] <--- source sided Coders--[0/3] <--- Client sided Web Developers--[1/2] <--- must know html/css GFx--[1/3] Bug/Glitch testers-- [0/3]
[size=24pt]How to apply ----------- [/size]
How old are you--: Role your applying for--: Experience--: Maturity Level--: How long you can be on--: Will you be dedicated--: Skypename/msn if you have it--:

item.title: Team Desire-X [Need People]
item.dc:creator: @Skillerpk Skillerpk
item.description:
@Skillerpk wrote:

How old are you–: 18
Role your applying for–: Bug Tester, Server sided Coder
Experience–: With testing 6 years of it. Coding about 5 months.
Maturity Level–: High
How long you can be on–: Hours a day
Will you be dedicated–: Very Much so
Skypename/msn if you have it–: Msn : naweber@hotmail.com

Read full topic

item.title: Team Desire-X [Need People]
item.dc:creator: @Dharma Dharma
item.description:
@Dharma wrote:

How old are you–: 17

Role your applying for–: Client coder- bug/glitch tester

Experience–: I’ve been coding for a while now.

Maturity Level–: I’m pretty mature. (Immature spells I’m mature. LOL. Jk.)

How long you can be on–: At the minimun probably 4 hours.

Will you be dedicated–: I can be dedicated for only this week and next. As when school starts I will have
little to no time. I have school, then sports, and then homework.

Skypename/msn if you have it–: kidmak2009@hotmail.com

Read full topic
